website_summaries.verdict: The Vivo 5R is yet another relatively low-cost, high-quality unlocked phone from Blu, but there's a lot of competition in the field.
pros: Fingerprint sensor, dual-band Wi-Fi, and expandable storage

customer_reviews.title: Great as VERY temporary phone i.e a few weeks!
customer_reviews.text: AVOID - YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR. It's a great phone if all you want is one to last you a few months. I have 2 major issues and the response from BLU in the US was a copy/paste email on how to hard reset it, losing all data & apps. Real helpful! I've just finished a chat session with Amazon Tech and they had the same suggestion. Real helpful again! The phone was fine until a week ago, now it simply won't sync email, texts or Whatsapp unless it's rebooted time after time after time, every day. The Amazon service is beyond disappointing and I can only advise anyone thinking about buying this to be VERY careful.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous J

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: For £109, I'm amazed. I'm sick of Samsung and iPhone prices going stupidly high so I thought I would take a chance, and what a phone. It's well made, very slim, light, fast and most importantly, it has a great screen, brilliant. The battery is great also, lasting the entire day with playing music, Bluetooth and YouTube for at least 8 hours. Brilliant. Thanks. Ian M.
customer_reviews.author: ian millar

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long before it fails
customer_reviews.text: This phone was great for a while, then it started playing up. It started slowing down, then kept losing the wifi connection, started turning itself off and rebooting for no apparent reason. Then swelled up blowing the back side clips off and the screen bulged forward. It is only the phone case holding it together. When fully functional this is a good phone. Sadly it started going wrong within a year. Being an online purchase, there is no go to support for help at a high street store, so sadly this phone is destined for the bin. I won't be using BLU again.
customer_reviews.author: TheHarpersWoteva

customer_reviews.title: My personal review
customer_reviews.text: This phone is simply amazing, I bought this for £109 and it is comparable to a samsung galaxy s4 but performs much better. I have also bought a Blu Studio One before (which wasnt bad) but was wary of the price and quality of this phone. In all honesty it has absolutely blown away my expectations with an amazing camera, battery life (lasts all day from early morning til midnight when playing music and games consistently) and is a really good budget smartphone that I'm enjoying alot.
customer_reviews.author: Lattaz

customer_reviews.title: This is my second phone of this, and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second phone of this, and it is definitely up there in comparison to the named brand phones. As I said my second, it even comes with a plug, screen cover, screen cover protection, can't fault it. also on a plus side has dual sim holder. I use my phone for social media, emails, reading, pictures, videos, games, watching tv, even word documents.
customer_reviews.author: cocoskin

customer_reviews.title: absolutely would not recommend. this phone was fine when first purchased
customer_reviews.text: absolutely would not recommend. this phone was fine when first purchased, however a month later the phone died and wouldnt turn back on, even when charged or charging. a replacement was ordered and everything seemed fine. few months later and the same thing has happened. the phone dies and nothing turns it back on. have used different chargers and ports and nothing. BLU clearly have no idea how to make a phone with a good battery, something they share with apple. 100% would not recommend anyone buys this phone.
customer_reviews.author: sim

customer_reviews.title: Overall a real good buy. PROS
customer_reviews.text: This phone surprise me in OS stability (actually running Android 7.0), quality build, screen colors, and bright. Decent rear camera, not so decent front camera. Overall a real good buy. PROS: -Snappy and responsive interface; -Camera Software (Tons of Modes) -Build Quality (sturdy with metal finishes, 2.5D curve screen -Great Speaker, very loud (dont trust the reviews saying otherwise) -PRICE -PRICE -PRICE CONS: -Not a very good Camera (neither front nor rear); -Due to the custom Android Skin from BLUE its hard to get use to. FINAL WORDS: An great great phone, and the best option at its price range.
customer_reviews.author: Jero7884

customer_reviews.title: Save cash good spec not far off a s8 .
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant phone if you want a cheap mobile deal like my self this is great does everything a galaxy s8 does camera and sound isnt as good but its 500quid cheaper lol , cheap sim only deal and youre saving yourself couple hundred quid over the year cant go wrong. Battery is good, Screen pic is hd No lag if youre watching vids on you tube app,facebook app etc . Slim phone , There is a lot of phone cases available for this phone and they are good quality considering this brand isnt a big name . Ill upgrade to the blu vivo 6 next year .
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this phone by a friend. I had never heard of BLU and still haven't found anyone else with one. I bought one for my wife then one for myself. It was just over £100 and to my thinking, well worth the money. The phone can accommodate two sims or one sim and a memory card. The camera is as good as any others I have seen/used. It had more storage than my previous phone so I have had no problems with installing apps. Battery lasts quite well - probably 2 days if I used it sparingly although I charge it daily. Why spend £4-£500 on a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage, really happy with the phone.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this phone, I replaced my Samsung J5 with this, for better storage, as i kept getting storage full message, and it would only store a few apps. This has 32gb of storage, which is plenty for all the apps I need. Internet works great, speaker is adequate for listening to music and youtube. Finger print sensor is also really handy for accessing phone quickly. Definitely way better than paying high prices for Iphone or others.
customer_reviews.author: James Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Great value smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Great value smartphone! Have been using for 6 months now and can't fault it. Lovely finish - it's a shame to keep it in the (free, included) silicone case (which isn't unattractive, and provides good protection). Crystal clear screen. Believe the hype! My friends can't believe how little it cost - goes to show the insane profits and marketing budgets of the big name brands...
customer_reviews.author: julian

customer_reviews.title: Glitches spoil what could have been a great budget phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone seems good value for money (£109) and works really well other than the screen freezes. The only way to get it working again is turn it off/on again, which can only take a second or two, but frustrating if you have security features set up (pin, face recognition, finger print etc). This happens in the middle of all apps, so writing a text, email becomes painful. This happens over 10 times a day, which takes away from what otherwise has been a good phone brought as a cheap replacement for my previous one. Camera is very average, but then for just over a £100 can you complain?
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Robust daily phone for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this phone as a daily since September 2017 as to replace my iPhone 5C. Brilliant phone, never really had any big issues. Only now has the aux port begun to fail. I've dropped it numerous times and the screen has never cracked. Last week I accidentally dropped it off a high ladder onto concrete and that caused a hairline fracture, but until then it's been great. Still useable.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable phone for the normal phone users!
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for about a month, so far so great! Omg the rose gold is stunning and totally worth the price if not a steal. Downloaded countless apps and still runs smoothly. Let's see, chargers fast, battery life average, easy to use, amazing memory storage space, I literally download episodes and watch on the train and everything continually runs smooth. Can't complain about anything really. The camera, maybe, is pretty decent for me, takes a great picture and is clear but not for the selfie loving type of people. Overall, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, great price
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. Really like this phone. Comes with screen protector and phone cover. Fingerprint recognition. Love the colour (gold). Great internal memory of 32GB. Will also take a 64GB SD card.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McA

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: So the first one died after a short few months and a replacement was gotten, 2 months later and the replacement is just as bad, often little or no internet connection, apps failing, failing to take a charge. And it is definitely the phone as we bought two of the same model originally, my white one is fine, husband's blue/grey one stops working after 2 months. Twice.
customer_reviews.author: jayne c.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: The phone is really quite good for the money. I bought it as a back up as my own phone is sticking/freezing and after my last phone gave up completely before I could back it up, I decided to buy this and transfer all contacts etc. That went very well and I now can relax knowing I will have no issue if my main phone just gives up.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Chalmers

customer_reviews.title: The phone overall is very good, however
customer_reviews.text: The phone overall is very good, however, you might miss some bits from high street android phones like Samsung. Android is the same however Samsung has more things installed in it. The camera is not as good as Samsung. I tried to connect it with sony tv to share some video of my child and was not able to do this by Bluetooth, or wifi direct. quite disappointing. Don't get me wrong it is still very good phone for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: Problems after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This was a great phone for 3 weeks and then little glitches started happening which I put down to me being a bit dimm technology wise, I phoned customer support for help and they were very good but suggested a reset . I didn't want to lose everything and the phone only played up intermittently, so I left it, but now everything is going wrong with it and im a week too late to return
customer_reviews.author: kerry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value. But don't forget to remove the sticker ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. But don't forget to remove the sticker from the back to get the sound to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: paul thornley

customer_reviews.title: It's a lovely phone but after 7 months use I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely phone but after 7 months use I have a problem with the battery. Whole night charging only charges 30%.that 30% only last half an hour. Luckily it's still under warranty, I'll contact amazon customer service team today if they can sort it out for me. Just contacted customer services they will replace it by tomorrow. Very good customer services.
customer_reviews.author: shoukat

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Excellent budget smartphone, performs like any high class £400 phone. Liam
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: The WiFi signal was dropping a lot and there was ...
customer_reviews.text: The WiFi signal was dropping a lot and there was a lot of echo from the microphone during VOIP calls.The phone started freezing after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Very annoyed only had a few months and will not charge I have vital information on this and expect a replacement straight away...
customer_reviews.author: louis allen

customer_reviews.title: Avoid blu brand
customer_reviews.text: Was a good phone for the price, not a known brand but had premium feel, spec and features. After 6 months problems started. Touchscreen will stop responding unless power key cycled. And then loses signal, both sims disconnect and reconnect when goto initiate a call. So didn't last a year and manufacturers don't respond.
customer_reviews.author: pjuk

customer_reviews.title: Super phone at a fraction of the cost of equivalent others out there
customer_reviews.text: Fed up with being ripped off by apple and samsung? this has to be the answer. This phone looks amazing! size and weight are great. Great screen, camera and as fast as my last iphone 6plus which failed on me - thanks, Apple! Anyway, for cheaper than a replacement screen, this must be worth it !
customer_reviews.author: seller Abc

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a phone!
customer_reviews.text: You get 80% of the functionality of an S8 for 20% of the price. Watch the Youtube videos comparing it to more expensive phones. You will be impressed. Crystal clear display, a fast processor and a very reasonable camera make up an excellent package. Not only is the technology good but it is very stylish, looking much more expensive that its actual cost. It's a real winner.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Aitkenhead

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for just over a month now, excellent quality works great nothing to complain about. The free case it comes with is really useful for keeping the phone in good condition. Would highly recommend this phone, definitely a revival for the Samsung and iPhones but for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, if a little slow, phone.
customer_reviews.text: Build quality on the phone is very good, feels more expensive than the £179.99 I paid. I've found, against my iPhone 6s, that using apps like Facebook, Instagram etc are a little slower but it's 1/3 of the price so can be forgiven. I don't use the camera so can't give any opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my partner. She love it, not had a single negative thing to say about it so far. Seems like fantastic value for £110.
customer_reviews.author: Sev

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This a great value phone I travel a lot and being locked into a contract doesn't make sense switch the Sim card and your up and running in any country The cameras is good it's got 32 gigs of memory plus you can add 32 more Just a simple good all round phone at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beware eventual battery and charging problems
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic screen quality display , initially good battery life until after about 18 months using the camera made the battery die and the phone shut down if it was less than about 75 per cent charge' then soon after the charging port slowly began to fail
customer_reviews.author: Edward Walker

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when buying
customer_reviews.text: Brought this as a gift,since I already brought one that one was great.but second one I brought sounds very low can't hear ringing that's it up full.when speaking to people I need them shout so I can hear them.kept meaning to contact seller due to this think left too long.need to look for new phone
customer_reviews.author: Ladyshaz

customer_reviews.title: best value mid range phone by far
customer_reviews.text: simply the best value mid range phone on the market. brilliant quality. great battery life.great performance and quality screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All round great phone,  outstanding value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, which represents outstanding value for money. It a great internal memory + option to expand with SD card. It also has better than usual battery life IME. I can thoroughly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: John wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Everything else is good apart from the battery
customer_reviews.text: The product look nice but it has a lot of problems. The battery can take 2 days before you can get 30%, you can't get even replacement battery to buy. Someone the radio goes off when you are making a call, or receiving a call. I am desperate to get my hands on a spare batteries.
customer_reviews.author: ANAS D.

customer_reviews.title: I did like the phone
customer_reviews.text: I did like the phone, but I don’t know how just in few months it was hacked and I am very very careful on which website I go in to. It looks like me and Android we do not understand each other.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Quality phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Much more durable then fancy branded ones. Quality is outstanding, lookes great. One year and never had a problem without it.
customer_reviews.author: HUBERT

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is a very capable and good value smart phone with an excellent screen
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a very capable and good value smart phone with an excellent screen. The Android skin which makes it operate in a manner similar to an iPhone is a welcome departure from standard Android. Battery life seems reasonable although once the battery level falls below 20% it drops quickly thereafter.
customer_reviews.author: al_chemist

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good screen. Reasonable charge time. Ok battery life. Good camera in good light. Basically best phone you can buy at this price (109£) it's up against Moto g5 and wileyfox 2x but it's way cheaper then them.
customer_reviews.author: umar

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my son. even thought the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son. even thought the brand is not very well known, he likes the fact that it's quick and has a lot of internal memory (32 GB).
customer_reviews.author: Pilar

customer_reviews.title: Eyes open
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I am amazed at how good the phone is so will be sticking with this model. No point paying loads of money for Samsung or iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma hill

customer_reviews.title: I love my phone 😍❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased the phone I never taught it would be so perfect, but it is the quality of pictures and the distance I can take photos , I sometimes charge my phone once every three days this phone delivers the best quality
customer_reviews.author: Monique Reid

customer_reviews.title: Pricing is attractive and setup is relatively easy
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone, does everything I need. Pricing is attractive and setup is relatively easy
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Potentially just poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Cheap crap parts both charger ports broke on both phones owned by different people some parts shouldn't have cost cut on!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well, supplied charging cable does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well, supplied charging cable does not work, most usb cables do not. Otherwise functions well as Android phone. No SIM changing tool in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jonathan V. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: presumably a bad battery but Amazon took it straight back so I'll ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it a week before it started having charging issues, presumably a bad battery but Amazon took it straight back so I'll never know. Would only get to about 50% overnight and barely able to hold steady while in use and on charge.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Parkins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Would definitely recommend you buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Really tidy phone, great quality, lots of memory space, 4g, extremely fast and great picture and sound. Would definitely recommend, not many people are aware of this brand or phone and I tell you now it's one of the best! Amazing price too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good value phone,it can freeze sometimes but for the price didn't expect as much as it gives
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Developed a fault and I returned it for full refund.

customer_reviews.title: i haven't got any receipt or invoice, so i ...
customer_reviews.text: i haven't got any receipt or invoice,so i can't enlarge any warranty.the battery supply is not sufficient enough,i just took about eighty pics,and the power is off.i doubt it may be a used phone.
customer_reviews.author: jarjet

customer_reviews.title: Only thing is that the camera is not the best and can be blurry sometimes
customer_reviews.text: had this phone a year, still going strong even when dropped a few times. The headphone jack has started to play up a bit but that is probably from where I dropped it. Would buy again. Only thing is that the camera is not the best and can be blurry sometimes. pics aren't as vibrant as a samsung. But if you just want to use for social media selfies it's fine :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and after an android update and transferring all my stuff its first use has been awesome, great quality, good looking, great camera and spec plus all teh Android 6 benefits
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: ... a a birthday present and so far he's really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my dad a a birthday present and so far he's really happy with it. It's been a month. Hopefully it will last with no trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Poe

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with my new phone which came recommended from a ...
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with my new phone which came recommended from a friend. Has all the similar features as the Samsung galaxy I was used to. Love the fingerprint unlock. Nice big screen. Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre W.

customer_reviews.title: State of the arts phone, its fast, updates ...
customer_reviews.text: State of the arts phone,its fast,updates, does everything the description states,Just remember to remove the back protector, it covers the speaker
customer_reviews.author: michael trudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Price/quality
customer_reviews.text: It definitely isn't top performer in the market, but much better than I've expected, for this price can't complain about a thing, excellent price/quality ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Bartosz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speed, ram
customer_reviews.text: Im very surprised of this phone is exactly to S7 but three times cheaper. Excellent speed, ram, camera, display! Everything. 100% Recommend

customer_reviews.title: Awful totally awful

customer_reviews.title: ... bigger than I expected but performance wise it's as good as any iPhone just haven't got the iPhone apps ...

customer_reviews.text: Great phone for money much better spec than iPhone comes with loads of extras

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: It's been more than two years since I brought this mobile. In excellent working condition.

customer_reviews.title: Good relation price:quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cell phone for its quality: price! The battery, when used with common apps, lasts a little more than a day, which is acceptable.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone! Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Great value! Lots of features you'd find on far more expensive phones! However, the only thing to let this phone down is the camera.

customer_reviews.title: Good GPS etc.
customer_reviews.text: Good GPS and compass, camera not bad. Everything works as it should. No complaints at all after a few months (unlike the cubot it replaced).

customer_reviews.title: What a great phone for the Money
customer_reviews.text: What a great phone for the Money! looks great and work well. I haven't tested it to much for games but I don't use my phone for games.

customer_reviews.title: Good phone.
customer_reviews.text: Always liked this phone and finally got one. My hubby has the vivo 5. I think it's a fantastic phone for the price even though mine is used really good price.

customer_reviews.text: I'm over the moon with this little phone it does everything I need it to do

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing for the price! Comes with a case, great camera. I cant say anything bad. Just as good as any other smart phone that would cost a fortune.

customer_reviews.title: PHONE IS SLOW AND SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: THE BATTERY DOESN'T CHARGE. THE PHONE IS SLOW AND SUCKS. I HATE THIS. GIMME A REFUND!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Blu Vivo 5r
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this phone as it is just as good or better than iPhone or Samsung for 1/5 of the price
customer_reviews.author: Walter C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, delivery time
customer_reviews.text: Excellent , delivery time, quality of phone is good , price correct.
customer_reviews.author: Amilcar Armoa

customer_reviews.title: A superb mobile!
customer_reviews.text: A very good phone, excellent storage, brilliant camera best mobile I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Andy thrower

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance and value for money
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to envy flagships of last year. If i had to find a fault or somethin to improve would be the camera performance. Everything else is perfect! Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have had no problems with this phone so far and would certainly purchase another Blu phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

MediaTek 6753 64-Bit 1.3 GHz Octa Core Processor, 32 GB internal memory 3 GB RAM and micro SD up to 64 GB
Equipped with 3,150 mAh battery and DTS surround sound
